Name: Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands (Premium Edition)
About the game: Support Iris and Robin and help them to win the Magical Tournament in 'Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands'! With help from new and old friends, new improvements to the farm, and unique upgrades, this Time Management game will have you occupied for hours! Grow and gather crops and flowers and win mini games to succeed!
